short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn on call privacy when on payment page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ctalk WorldPay CR for use with the Ctalk Contact Centre products.  The extension is used to control the pause and resume of the ctalk software using a locally installed application.
